title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message:
Hello guys! I have a water-damaged 820-3476 which only can work when the battery IS attached.

History: All it could do before was a loud fan spin, nothing more. I cleaned the board, replaced some SMD's and ISL as well around that area. I found corrosion under U8030 and jumped pin2 to C8010. The board turning on and chime as well. Has no backlight and only working on battery. The main thing I want to repair on it is the power issue first.

Here is the problem with:

It does NOT charging the battery, can read the cycle count, show proper percentage. I have green then orange led on the charger. If the battery is disconnected from the board, all it can do with original 60w/85w adapter is turning on, chime then shut off. turning on again .. ... same cycle. I tried with other battery, charging port, have the same symptom.

I'm not expert in board repair but I was able to solve some backlight, isl and other kind of problems before on other board but I'm stuck with this one.

I would greatly appreciate any suggestion, help.

Sorry for the grammatical errors. :)

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: Green light that turns orange present? Resistance between pin 17/18, 27/28 of the ISL6259?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: Thank you for your answer. Green light that turns orange is present. I'm going the measure the resistances tomorrow and answer your question about that. (different timezones)

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: I checked it, 17/18 is 28 ohm, 27/28 is 0 ohm. Should be around 20 ohm and 3 ohm ?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: It is close enough. Is PPBUS present when you just have adapter plugged in?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message:
Hey there!

Without battery (original 85W adapter):

When the board is powering on PPBUS_G3H is 12.6V
When shuts off itself then 3.6V after a sec it’s starting again to turning on with 12.6V then shuts off and 3.6v.

With battery:

Dropping from 12.8V to around 5V, going back to 12.8V dropping again to 5V…

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: Must be an issue around ISL6259. Check pins 17/18 again as they should be 3 Ohm and 27/28 21Ohm, you reported it the other way around.

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: The measurements was fine, and the resistors was the problem!!!  I love you from the bottom of my hearth. Thank you very much for helping me out.

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 only operating on battery
message: Someone swapped those resistors around then!
